channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger's garbage-compacting truck is soiling the beach in 'Pups Save a Rubbish-Dinger', then in 'Pups Save the Royal Armour', a gift for the Princess gets scattered all over town. (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit track a legendary creature in 'The Legend of the Night Howler', then in 'The Haystack Stakeout', who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile? (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: There's a game of hide-and-seek in the wetlands in 'The Lost Capybara Kids', then in 'The Case of the Curious Keas', Sam and Kit try to figure out who's playing tricks on them in the snow. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Cupcake Tree: When the Gabby Cats get stuck in the leaves of an overgrown cupcake tree, it's up to Gabby, Pandy and cupcake-expert Cakey to work together to save CatRat. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nature Class: Nanny Plum takes the Fairy children for a nature class in the woods, and bumps into the Wise Old Elf who is teaching a nature class to the Elf children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bug Hotel; Superhero Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Has A Cough; Mr. Potato's Fruit & Vegetable Quiz: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Club House; Funny Music: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Shop; Buttercups, Daisies and Dandelions: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Digi and Tal's inventions go haywire in 'Pups Save a Runaway Robo-Chicken Purse', then in 'Pups Save the Buggy Trekkers', Humdinger squeezes himself into the dune buggy race. (S10, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Bull is Getting Married: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day! (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding: Everyone is getting ready for Mr Bull and Mrs Cow's wedding, going to the jewellers to get rings, to the dress makers. and to sort out the wedding cake! (S7, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wedding Day; Party Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid! (S7, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Movie Night: Peppa and friends are at Penny Polar Bear's house for a movie night. But before they can watch it, the children need to decide where to sit, and which popcorn to eat. (S7, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The VIP: King Leopold has announced he is paying a visit to The Little Kingdom. Everyone is very excited that they have a VIP coming and prepare to welcome him. But King Thistle is feeling left out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf Takes a Holiday: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isn't too pleased. But Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed! Meanwhile, Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Move To Music: Madame Gazelle is getting Peppa and her playgroup friends to dance to all different styles of music.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: London: Madame Gazelle takes the whole class to London for the day and get a tour by The Queen herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Simple Science: While the playground is getting rebuilt, Daddy Pig teaches the children some simple science.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: School Project: It's school project time for Peppa and her friends which means they have to build castles and bring them into playgroup.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick; Jumping Stick; Racquet Games; Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games; Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Baby Benny Box is Here!: Baby Box is getting a Box Baby brother. Gabby and Pandy go in the dollhouse to meet the new baby, Benny Box. Mama Box asks Gabby, Pandy, and Baby Box to babysit! (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: There's a special photo wall in the park in 'Paddington's Favourite Hero', then in 'Paddington And The Skateboarder', Mateo helps Paddington to become a heroic skateboarder. (S3, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A special spooky play is planned in 'Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show', then in 'Paddington saves the Mooncake Festival', Taylor the lifeguard arrives in Windsor Gardens. (S3, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? It's Burn's Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus; Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition; Larenzo Lion; Dinosaurs Alive!: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye: When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Go for the Gold: Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Swift: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Isaac and his Cockapoo, Oreo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their rescue mission? To find and rescue seagulls stuck in tricky spots around the garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora throws a super-secret surprise party in 'Abuela's Quinceanera', then in 'Story Time', Dora's friend Coco doesn't have a story, so they go to the Tall Tale Tree in search of one! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help fix their friend's running shoes in 'Run Cynthia Run', then in 'Dora In Space', Dora and Boots rescue Tico from space after his spaceship falls apart! (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Snack Shack Comeback: Neville organizes a fundraiser when a storm damages Ferdinand's Snack Shack.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Hungry the Seagull: Spyke befriends a seagull named Hungry, leading to chaos on Kangaroo Beach.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Carlita the Ice Cream Truck!: Gabby unboxes an attachment that turns Carlita into an Ice Cream Truck! The only problem is.there's no ice cream! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Boots win the Rainforest Race in 'Rainforest Race', then in 'Bok Bok Birthday', Dora invites friends to Big Red Chicken's birthday party. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Lily and Farmer have to save the village from a slobbering monster in 'Monster in the Village', then in 'Granny's Doll', Rowena is turned into Smurfette and takes her place in the village. (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dwayne is turned into a tracker dog to help his uncle to catch the Smurfs in 'Gargamel's Doggy', then in 'Drummer Girl', Gargamel bewitches Meteorite's drum and hypnotizes the Smurfies. (S4, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Grace and her long-haired Dachshund, Teddy, as they join The Real Pup Squad! The local caf? hasn't received its food delivery.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caves: The family has all gone to the caves for a day out and Grampy Rabbit is their tour guide.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Toy Plane: Grandpa Pig shares with Peppa and George his love of building toy planes and there is one extra special plane that Granny Pig has yet to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Madame Gazelle's House: Peppa, George, Mummy and Daddy Pig have gone to visit Madame Gazelle and her wonky house.

channel.desc: Long Train Journey; Suzy Goes Away: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs. Witch's Spring Clean: Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum help Mrs Witch have a bit of a clear-out. The children bring the magical items back home, but in the wrong hands they cause a few problems.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George is upset when he loses his favourite toy in 'Mr Dinosaur is Lost', and then in 'Best Friend', Peppa loves playing doctors and nurses with her best friend, Suzy Sheep.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Polly Parrot; Hide and Seek: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Playgroup; Mummy Pig at Work: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George play a game, and George gets a little help from Daddy Pig in 'Piggy in the Middle', and then in 'Daddy Loses His Glasses', Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for what's lost.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: The Slowest Race in the World: When Thomas, Kana, and Diesel 'race' to see who can go the slowest, their lack of speed provides challenges - and lets Thomas see what he might have missed. (S27, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Bruno's Blustery Day: On a windy day, the team has to band together for an important delivery. When it seems the elements will be too much, they learn they can ask each other for help. (S27, ep 18).

channel.desc: Cuckoo Clock; Ice Skating: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora is shrunk by Big Red Chicken's magic in 'Little Dora's Big Adventure', then in 'Bye Bye Balloon', Dora and Boots help get Benny's Balloon under control. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A storm drops hailstones that hatch into baby space rocks in 'Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks', and in 'Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys', a 3D printer leads to pranks all over Adventure Bay. (S9, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A dance contest goes wrong in 'Dancing with Luke Stars!', then in 'Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus', the pups investigate a mystery at an undersea museum exhibit, and discover an octopus! (S8, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom in 'The Unidentified Shiny Object', and in 'The Case of the Crying Monkey', the duo follows sounds to locate a baby monkey. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The duo must figure out why bats are suddenly sneezing in 'The Bat Cave Crisis', and then in 'The Mysterious Ant Circle', biting army ants march through a birthday picnic. (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Cakey's Cupcake Cousins: It's cousin time. Bakey, Flakey, Marshapan and Paddycake visit Cakey and the dollhouse gang for a sprinkle-rific day of yummy snacks and hug attacks. (S2, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Toy Robot: Out playing in the meadow, Holly, Ben and their friends find a broken toy robot. Holly fixes it with magic, but the robot does not behave as they thought it would.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Bad Barry: King Thistle wants fish for dinner, so he goes out fishing with Mr Elf, Ben and Holly on Mr Elf's boat. Mr Elf tells them a story about the biggest, baddest fish ever - Big Bad Barry.

channel.desc: Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin in 'Pups Save A Teeny Tiny Penguin', then in 'Pups Save the Cat Show', Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running wild.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party: At Chloe's party, the children and grownups struggle to finish the obstacle course to reach the prize. George is the last to try and finds the birthday cake! (S7, ep 27).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus: Miss Rabbit arrives with the broken bus. This is a job for Grampy Rabbit! Once fixed, Mummy Rabbit and Rebecca Rabbit arrive with a cake for Grampy Rabbit's birthday! (S7, ep 28).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus: The children must walk to school in a walking bus! Miss Rabbit wears a high visibility jacket, leading Peppa and friends in a bus formation. (S7, ep 34).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Moving In: Peppa is playing with Candy Cat when Emily Elephant's Granny moves out of the apartment. When the new neighbours arrive, Peppa recognises her holiday friend Rohan Rhino. (S7, ep 32).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Larenzo Lion: Today, Mummy Pig and Peppa are at the zoo and meet Larenzo Lion who lives there! Larenzo shows Peppa his toy zoo, but he keeps misplacing his wooden animals in his two bedrooms.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Larenzo Lion: Today, Mummy Pig and Peppa are at the zoo and meet Larenzo Lion who lives there! Larenzo shows Peppa his toy zoo, but he keeps misplacing his wooden animals in his two bedrooms.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!: Peppa and all her friends are having a sleepover - different friends in each of the apartments in the high street. So they play hide and seek across all the rooms! (S7, ep 33).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Honey Bees: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Pet: The Twins really want a pet and Nanny Plum sets about getting them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf even brings Pippin a hamster wheel.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Pirate Treasure: When Captain Squid leaves his treasure map in the Little Kingdom, Redbeard the Elf Pirate leads Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum on a treasure hunt.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Police: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig's Book: Mummy Pig has finally finished writing her first book and decides to take it to playgroup to read to the children with unexpected results.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Zoo: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Outback: The Pig family visit the Kangaroo family in Australia! On their first day they fly into the outback in Mr Kangaroo's aeroplane, have a barbeque and play some cricket with a Koala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work! (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure. (S3, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Pups Save a Cat Burglar: It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Rowan and his energetic Dalmatian, Shadow, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Together, they take on a playful mission to recover all the balls that have been tipped out of the basket.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora's family makes a pinata for Mami that flies away in 'A Pinata For Mami', then in 'Invisi-Swiper', Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket. (S2, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Abuela win the Great Abuela Cook-off in 'The Great Abuela Cookoff', and in 'Missing Map', Dora finds Map after a game of Hide-and-Seek. (S2, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Friendly rhinos gather at the Watering Hole in 'The Riddle of Raging Rhinos', and in 'The Trouble in the Tundra', Sam and Kit are on the case when the Mice Squad goes missing in the Arctic. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Troll untwist his tongue in 'Tongue Twisted Troll', then in 'Chompy and the Cloud Flower', Chompy chomped a rare seed and Dora finds a new one. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Kaiden and his Siberian Husky, Luca, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To rescue two alpacas stranded in the garden's snowy zones.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Gardening: Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hiccups: George has hiccups and Peppa has fun trying to cure him.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Secrets: Mummy Pig gives Peppa a special box to keep secret things in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Flying a Kite; Picnic: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Musical Instruments; Frogs and Worms and Butterflies: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Fruit Harvest: It is harvest day. The Elves and fairies enlist the help of Mr Gnome in picking blackberries. If only they could stop him from eating them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dressing Up; New Shoes: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa enjoys face painting, the balloons and the bouncy castle at 'The School Fete', and then in 'Mummy Pig's Birthday', Peppa, George and Daddy Pig prepare a birthday surprise for Mummy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's tooth falls out, but by the next day it has become a coin in 'The Tooth Fairy'. Then in 'The New Car', Peppa's family car breaks down. While it is being mended, they borrow a shiny new one.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Treasure Hunt; Not Very Well: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Night Lights: Thomas and Nia play with spare lights, excited to stay up all night to test them. But James thinks that goofing is a waste of time and is much too busy. (S27, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: For Love of Muddy: When the engines take on a muddy job, Kana is given the best job on a fast clean route, until she realises that she would rather use her skills in another way. (S27, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends go on a trip to the mountains in 'School Bus Trip', and then in 'Rebecca Rabbit', Peppa and George visit Rebecca Rabbit's house. It is a bit different - it's inside a hill.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family learn how to follow trails of footprints in 'Nature Trail', and then in 'Pen Pal', Peppa gets letters from Delphine Donkey and speaks to her on the telephone.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Everything Day: Pounce tries to fit everything into one day with his dad but forgets safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Snack Shack Comeback: Neville organizes a fundraiser when a storm damages Ferdinand's Snack Shack.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Storm and the Lost Talisman: Gargamel is looking for a talisman that will help him to find the Smurfies' village. Storm decides that she's going to get there before him. But it's a trap! (S4, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a Unicornasaurus get a magic paintbrush back in 'Unicornasaurus', then in 'The Grumple Games', Dora helps Hearty win the Grumple Games. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped in 'Pups Save a Trophy', then in 'Pups Save the Wind Trekkers', Humdinger's mum Helga loses her son's phony trophy, and the Paw Patrol rescue her. (S9, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog in 'Pups Save a Show Jumper', then in 'Pups Save the Salmon', the pups must help salmon get to the ocean, and Alex gets stuck on top of a dam. (S8, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The pals search for who nabbed a crab's spiral shell home in 'The Case of the Blue Bandit', then in 'The Honey Badger Break-In', Sweetie sneaks onto Sam and Kit's bee-infested aircraft. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Mystery on the Monsoon Express: Animal detectives Sam and Kit collect all the clues while searching for the slithering suspect who bit an express train's engineer. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Rainy Day Banana: Gabby, Pandy and CatRat inexplicably find a sparkly banana on a rainy day. (S1, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Charity Shop; Bat and Ball: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Owl; Buried Treasure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; Lucky Hamper: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Big Hill; Strawberries: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rocky goes missing at Uncle Otis's cabin in 'Pups and the Werepuppy!', then in 'Pups Save a Sleepwalking Mayor', It's Cowboy Day, and Mayor Goodway faces the hazards of the ranch while sleepwalking.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaurs Alive!: The playgroup is visiting the zoo today. Mr Lion then shows them a giant lizard! The children all believe it's a dinosaur.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Being Babies: Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit pretend to be babies to get Mummy Rabbit's attention. Mummy Rabbit plays along until they admit they are not really babies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe; Cushion Den: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Indoor Adventure: A storm cancels Peppa and her family's adventure plans so they decide to take it inside. Using their imagination, they go sledding, climb a mountain and have a campfire in the attic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Staying Up Late: Auntie, Uncle Pig and cousin Chloe are coming for dinner and Peppa is allowed to join too! Peppa is very proud of staying up late - she even stayed up later than the Daddies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day; Folk Music Band: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie; House Rules: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Big Announcement: Today is a special day because Mummy and Daddy Pig have big news to tell Peppa and George. However, Peppa and George struggle to wait patiently, so resort to playing games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: New TV: Peppa and family are watching TV. until it breaks! While Grampy Rabbit fixes it, the family get a new TV which can do everything. but it doesn't beat their old TV.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Picnic: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny and Granpapa: A magical card arrives in the Little Kingdom, inviting everyone to a party at Granny and Granpapa Thistle's castle in the clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Morning Noon And Night: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Surfing: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Great Barrier Reef: Today the family go to work with Mrs Kangaroo on the Great Barrier Reef. While taking in the beautiful views in Mrs Kangaroo's submarine, they find some special treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Nursery Rhymes: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Nursery Rhymes: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River; Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River; Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie; House Rules; Big Announcement; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River; Granny Sheep Moves In: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Heady Humdinger: Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A superfood cake creates some super heroes in 'Paddington's Hero Squad', then in 'Paddington's Knightly Quest', Paddington wants to become a Knight; but needs to complete heroic quests! (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes in 'Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant', then in 'Paddington and the Accidental Hero', Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus; Movie Night: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day; Wildflower Wood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Savannah Race: In the sunny Savannah, Bop and Boo wait for Jeff, their car-loving giraffe friend. (S1, ep 43).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Champions of The Day: The Brave Bunnies make an unscheduled Savannah stop when their Bunny Bus conks out, and while the parents fix the bus. (S1, ep 34).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Bubble Trouble: The Brave Bunnies stop in the plains so Pa and Ma can wash the bus. Bop and Boo grab bubble kits and set off to play. They meet a mouse and invite her to join the fun. (S1, ep 38).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots have to get a picture of a rare bird for Abuela in 'Catch The Quickatoo', then in 'Lost Lorito', Dora and Boots return a baby parrot home, who can't stop copying Boots. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The Curse of Boomerang Island: A leisure sailing trip turns dangerous when a boat gets stuck on a reef.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Whale Song Spectacular: The cadets throw a whale concert to attract baby whales for Gemma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Baby Benny Box is Here!: Baby Box is getting a Box Baby brother. Gabby and Pandy go in the dollhouse to meet the new baby, Benny Box. Mama Box asks Gabby, Pandy, and Baby Box to babysit! (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora throws a super-secret surprise party in 'Abuela's Quinceanera', then in 'Story Time', Dora's friend Coco doesn't have a story, so they go to the Tall Tale Tree in search of one! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: It's Smurfies versus Gargamel in 'See Gargamel Run', then in 'Hefty Baby', Baby Smurf gets stronger. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dimwitty and Clumsy get rid of the fire truck in 'Fire Brigade on Foot', then in 'The Prettiest Pebble in the World', Gargamel leaves magic pebbles in the forest to hypnotize the Smurfs. (S4, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Bill and Jill's satellite van has a hole in it in 'The Case of the Big Chomp', and in 'The Secret of the Salt Cave', Sam and Kit investigate the shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: Meet Issy and her water-loving chocolate Labrador, Mo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! When a group of baby ducklings waddles away from their mummy, it's up to Issy and Mo to bring them back safe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Windy Castle: Peppa and her family visit Windy Castle. The view from Windy Castle is fantastic - Peppa and George can even see Granny and Grandpa's house.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: My Cousin Chloe: Peppa's big cousin Chloe is coming to visit. Peppa is used to playing games by her own rules, but she finds that she has met her match in Chloe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Ballet Lesson: Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson. Peppa loves dancing. Everyone loves dancing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa loves the big muddy puddles made by 'Thunderstorm', and a muddy car means that Peppa and George can have fun helping Mummy and Daddy in 'Cleaning the Car.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lunch; Camping: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Plumbing: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. It's a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming round, there's not much time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Sleepy Princess; The Tree House: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Fancy Dress Party; The Museum: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Very Hot Day; Chloe's Puppet Show: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig loves to watch TV, but Peppa Pig thinks that he needs to do some exercise in 'Daddy Gets Fit', then it's time to tidy up the bedroom in 'Tidying Up', although it doesn't last very long.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Jolly's Riding Club: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Spies: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Ben & Holly: When a spell accidentally goes wrong, Ben and Holly grow to human size! Now they can play with Lucy and her friends, and want to stay big forever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lucky Hamper; Jelly: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Potty Training; Trampolines: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Health Check; Skate Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mountain Climbing; Police Boat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Band: Snobby King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit the Little Kingdom, and Holly and her Mummy and Daddy enlist the Elf Band to impress them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Hard Times: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups squirrel-proof a post office in 'The Crew Builds A Post Office', then in 'The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash', Rubble & Crew transforms the car wash. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit save a town from being pulled underground in 'The Secret of the Sand Serpent', and in 'The Disappearance of Peggy Scratch', the pals search for the leader after a flight test. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the twins see the rainbow in 'Rainbow's Lost Colours', then in 'Boots' Rubber Band Ball', Boots has to retrieve his ball after it lands in Cynthia the Centipede's yard. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Super Thinkers!: Gabby, Pandy and Carlita attend DJ Catnip's Super Thinker Camp, where they tackle the puzzles and obstacles so they can earn their rainbow capes and become Super Thinkers. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Playground; Daddy Puts Up A Picture: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: At The Beach; Mister Skinnylegs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf Swap Jobs For One Whole Day: Nanny Plum and The Wise Old Elf each think they work harder than the other. King Thistle commands them to swap for the day to find out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The VIP: King Leopold has announced he is paying a visit to The Little Kingdom. Everyone is very excited that they have a VIP coming and prepare to welcome him. But King Thistle is feeling left out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef turns a garden cactus into nopales in 'Nopales Tacos', then in 'Sloppy Joes', Chef tries to keep his new apron clean. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs in 'Pups Save the Runaway Turtles', then in 'Pups Save the Shivering Sheep', Farmer Al's sheep run away, and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Paper Games: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway: Suzy describes a takeaway and the children want to make their own. Together they 'cook' and deliver the pretend takeaways to the parents. They get great reviews too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In: Peppa is playing at Suzy's house and they find out that Granny Sheep is moving in! She transforms the dull spare room and attic into an exotic boudoir and creative studio.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Swift; What Babies Do: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lenses: Peppa hands Penny and Pedro the wrong glasses by mistake and they can't see very well. Madame Gazelle then tells them the importance of lenses and how they're in all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cardboard Boxes: Peppa is at Suzy's house and there is a pile of cardboard boxes so, they take them outside to play with. Peppa turns the boxes into a cardboard shop, a spaceship and even a hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Acorn Day: It's autumn and the Elves and Nanny Plum are busy clearing up all the leaves. Suddenly the squirrels arrive with a mission to store acorns in the Great Elf Tree. Acorn Day has arrived.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Queen Bakes Cakes: A cake sale is organised to mend the magic school, but Queen Thistle is baking and no-one can eat her cakes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.
